member.name: TPM_DEVICE_INFO
member.summary: Provides information about the version of the TPM.

member.name: TPM_DEVICE_INFO.structVersion
member.summary: The version of the TBS context implementation. This parameter must be set to TPM_VERSION_20.

member.name: TPM_DEVICE_INFO.tpmVersion
member.summary: TPM version. Will be set to TPM_VERSION_12 or TPM_VERSION_20.
